member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainMiddleware
member.summary: Middleware provider which processes subdomain requests and ensures that any routes identified as subdomains are correctly routed

member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings
member.summary: Loads settings to configure the routes that are subdomains.

member.name: P:Subdomain.Plugin.SubdomainSettings.Disabled
member.summary: Determines whether the subdomain routing is disabled or not.

member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SubdomainTimingsSubMenu
member.summary:
Returns Timings information for all time spent processing subdomain requests and can be viewed within SystemAdmin.Plugin.
This class descends from SystemAdminSubMenu.

member.name: M:Subdomain.Plugin.Classes.SystemAdmin.SubdomainTimingsSubMenu.Data
member.summary: Returns Timings data in milliseconds for time spent processing by Subdomain.Plugin requests.

member.name: T:Subdomain.Plugin.PluginInitialisation
member.summary: Implements IPlugin which allows the Subdomain.Plugin module to be loaded as a plugin module
